post.body: Good afternoon!
Jump start the brain with some cookies?
Because 7 ate (8) 9!
It's still on, darlin' - come on over at 7 pm! I'm in Muscatine until 3 pm today, so I'll be home in time for the gig!
Sugar. Right. Those that know you, know better...
NWS reads that the worse of the weather will be south of Burlington and north of I80. We may luck out!
Did you tell her hands off the cuteness?!
Well, Houston and Nola got snow already.
This weather has *got* to get its act together, I need another trip to Chicago soon (and I got my Ipass finally!)
Hmmm, not only interesting, but now I'm quite hungry!
Davenport - slushy as usual (passed an accident on River Dr and Harrison), Hwy 22 is partially covered, Muscatine mostly slush
I'm about to go dig my car from under its blanket of snow. I hope the highways are somewhat cleared.
Tomorrow looks like a decent day, then it all goes to hell in a cold handbasket on Thursday!
Congratulations!
I hope you feel better soon!
I forgot a lot of stuff on last Sunday - no surprise I forgot the cooler =)
Curry! You have to ask?! Bring it =) I also have your cooler, woman, from the last gig. See you this evening.
Not allowed - there's fun to be had this evening!
Yum! Turtles!
Sorry I had to miss a Borders run to bake those lemon cupcakes! I'm cheating and getting Betty Crocker frosting.
This from the woman who'll discuss cannibalism at dinner?
Oh that's rough - I'm sure he misses you, too.
Oh just tell them to lighten up already. An f-bomb every now and then doesn't hurt anyone, especially while singing it.
One hour to pull the ice off my car and car windows. Some places it was 1.5" thick. At work now, and hoping hwys are good in a few hours.
Crazy making! Just played "Catch Phrase" at office lunch party - I rule!
The dark chocolate hazelnut bundt is baked (office party tomorrow), and now this Bibliovixen slips into the arms of Morpheus.
Getting ready to head out for the SnB evening with the Secret Santa Exchange!
Doing the happy dance in my office chair-my Signature Needles were shipped today! http://www.signatureneedlearts.com/
It's up early tomorrow morning for me - to work out and then dig out the car and get to work, off to bed...
Looks longing at my knitting and books, but goes back to work...
the Gran's tree is only 3ft so where in the hell are all these ornaments coming from?
It's 2009, so let's get crackin' already! Books to read, items to knit, hooch to drink, and a new president to swear in... Happy New Year!
at the nye gig so an early happy new year to y'all!
She's sweet on Wagner/I think she'd die for Beethoven/She loves the way Puccini lays down a tune/And Verdi's always creeping from her room
Enjoying a fun new author I stumbled upon, Anthony Capella. http://www.anthonycapella.com/index.asp Reading his "Food of Love" now.
Taste test of the homemade lemon cupcakes I'm baking for the NYE gig tomorrow night reveals: Mmmmm!
Would love to be sitting on a sunny, warm balcony with divine hot chocolate and fresh cornetti. http://www.herkut.net/kuvat/cornetto.jpg
Oh damn it all. Livejournal is down for "emergency maintenance." No getting my blog on tonight, going to go sip my homemade hot chocolate.
Well, alright then. I'm Twittered, Facebooked, and now LinkedIn. This networking gig is so tiring...
It's now enchilada time!
